long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple Note is a simple Chrome extension that lets you take notes while browsing using the browser. So, you don't need to switch from your browser to a word processing application just to take simple notes. Just click the Simple Note icon, a container for making simple notes will appear.

All records stored in this extension are stored locally, or not stored on any server. So, you can safely record anything without worrying that your data will be misused.

The features in this extension are also very simple. That is, only need to fill in the title and content. So, you can take notes quickly without having to think about other things such as categories, tags, and various other inputs.

If you have problems using this extension, you can contact me by sending an email to syafamaryam222@gmail.com
